definition: heel/to follow closely/to go with/(of a woman) to marry sb/with/compared with/to/towards/and (joining two nouns)
to follow/to comply with/varying according to.../to allow/subsequently

sentences.chinese: 莎士比亞的“付費圍牆”跟隨他走四方。
你船將跟隨“亞特蘭大”船。

sentences.english: Exercises follow each chapter, with hints and answers supplied.
sentences.chinese: 練習跟隨每章，帶有暗示和答案提供。

sentences.english: Although people going to follow, but also try to find a telephone.
sentences.chinese: 外出時雖有人跟隨，但也要想辦法找電話打。

sentences.english: As can be seen from the cartoon, nowadays many people follow the hen and swarm into the tide of promise-making.
sentences.chinese: 從圖中看出，現如今很多人跟隨潮流，信奉承諾制。

sentences.english: He also demanded that his followers commit themselves to him wholeheartedly.
sentences.chinese: 他也要求他的跟隨者全心全意的把自己交託給他。

sentences.english: Are you following with Pastor Rick on the Daniel Plan?
sentences.chinese: 你願意跟隨瑞克牧師的但以理計劃嗎？

sentences.english: And he too passed on with the waggon .
sentences.chinese: 這名士兵也跟隨大車走過去了。

sentences.english: Interestingly, forex markets haven't followed equities into this risk-off mode.
sentences.chinese: 有意思的是，外匯市場並未跟隨股市進入避險模式。

sentences.english: Baby angels see me climb, stop my tumbles every time.
sentences.chinese: 寶貝天使看着我醒來，跟隨者我的一舉一動。

sentences.english: Aspires to own his own business following his basketball career.
sentences.chinese: 熱望擁有跟隨他的籃球事業的他自己的生意。

sentences.english: The Reds midfielder is undecided whether he will follow team-mate Jamie Carragher by taking his coaching badges.
sentences.chinese: 紅軍隊長還未決定是否跟隨隊友卡拉格考取教練證書。

sentences.english: Kitten pumas are playful and begin to follow the female on hunts when they are about two months old.
sentences.chinese: 美洲獅幼仔好嬉戲，約兩個月後就開始跟隨母獅捕食。

sentences.english: You are responsible for yourself and your child's personal and property safety.
sentences.chinese: 您須對您及跟隨您的孩子的人身和財產安全負責。

sentences.english: One of the best clues to company dress codes is what your boss wears.
sentences.chinese: 有一個好方法，就是跟隨你的上司的穿法。

sentences.english: Abimelech and the companies with him rushed forward to a position at the entrance to the city gate.
sentences.chinese: 亞比米勒和跟隨他的一隊向前闖去，站在城門口。

definition: to separate oneself from/to break away from/diastasis (medicine)/abscission/abjunction (botany)
to go forward/to forge ahead/to advance/onward
to come and go/to have friendly relations with/in the past/previous
and/furthermore/also/together with/(not) at all/simultaneously/to combine/to join/to merge
to crane one's neck/to await eagerly/to lead/to show the way
to continue/to proceed with/to go on with
